Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Steam ID linking to player passport system

New features:
- /linksteam - Link Discord account to Steam ID \(validated via Steam API\)
- /unlinkid - Admin command to unlock user''s linked ID for re-linking
- /myid now shows Discord, Steam, and Alderon accounts
- /playerid searches across all ID types \(Discord, Steam, Alderon\)

Security:
- IDs are locked once linked \(prevents ban evasion\)
- Users must request admin unlock to change their linked ID
- Steam IDs validated via Steam Web API before linking

Files added:
- migrations/006_steam_linking.sql - Database schema updates
- services/steam_api.py - Steam Web API integration

Future-proofing:
- verified_at and verification_method columns for RCON verification
- required_ids guild setting for server-configurable ID requirements

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete RCON integration system for premium features

This commit implements the full RCON integration system supporting both
The Isle Evrima \(binary protocol\) and Path of Titans \(Source RCON\).

Major Features:
- Multi-server RCON management \(unlimited servers per guild\)
- All 18 Evrima RCON protocol commands implemented
- Raw console command passthrough for Path of Titans
- Enhanced player list with dinosaur info, gender, growth, Prime Elder status
- Modal-based UX for list inputs and dangerous command confirmations
- Game type validation with clear error messages
- Action summaries showing what each command did

New Commands:
/rcon addserver - Configure RCON server
/rcon servers - List configured servers
/rcon removeserver - Remove server
/rcon test - Test connection
/rcon kick - Kick player
/rcon ban - Ban player \(with confirmation modal\)
/rcon announce - Send in-game announcement
/rcon dm - DM player in-game
/rcon players - List online players with detailed info
/rcon save - Save server state
/rcon console - Raw command for PoT servers
/rcon wipecorpses - Wipe corpses \(with confirmation\)
/rcon allowdinos - Update playable dinos \(modal\)
/rcon whitelist - Toggle whitelist
/rcon whitelistadd - Add to whitelist \(modal\)
/rcon whitelistremove - Remove from whitelist \(modal\)
/rcon globalchat - Toggle global chat
/rcon togglehumans - Toggle human players
/rcon toggleai - Toggle AI spawns
/rcon disableai - Disable AI classes \(modal\)
/rcon aidensity - Set AI density
/rcon startverify - RCON verification
/rcon verify - Complete verification

Database:
- migrations/007_rcon_pterodactyl.sql - RCON/Pterodactyl tables
- migrations/008_remove_encryption_fixed.sql - Remove encryption from passwords

Services:
- services/rcon.py - RCON clients for Evrima and PoT
- services/pterodactyl.py - Pterodactyl API wrapper \(placeholder\)
- services/sftp_logs.py - Log monitoring \(placeholder\)
- services/encryption.py - Encryption utilities \(deprecated\)

Config:
- Added all RCON commands to permission system
- Updated .env.example with RCON/encryption settings
- Added context/ to .gitignore

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add /server refresh command to re-discover servers

- New command /server refresh re-discovers servers from Pterodactyl
- Uses stored API key to reconnect without re-entering credentials
- Clears old server list and fetches fresh server list
- Shows results per connection with server count
- Helpful error messages if API key no longer has access
- Added PterodactylQueries.clear_discovered_servers\(\) method
- Updated /help and /server help to include refresh command
- Added to COMMAND_CATEGORIES, FEATURE_COMMANDS, and COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS

This fixes the issue where server assignment changes in the panel
don''t reflect in the bot until you re-run setup with a new API key.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
